name: Blaku!
description:
Blaku is a survival game by rounds, in which you will have to kill the enemies that go through the sides of the screen to get money and in this way to improve your weapons.

Some of the main features

- Different shooting modes

- 7 different enemies 

- 9 different weapons 

- Some objects in the game to make you invincible!

among many others!

Play to know everything about this game!

# Controls
* Use left or right arrow to move

 

* Use up arrow to jump

* Use spacebar to shot
